meanings.sent1: The undulatory pattern of the snake's movement mesmerized the onlookers.
meanings.sent2: The undulatory motion of the ocean waves was calming to watch.
meanings.sent3: The undulatory dance of the flames in the campfire seemed to mimic the snake's slithering.
meanings.sent4: The undulatory path of the roller coaster made riders feel like they were surfing on waves.
meanings.sent5: The undulatory flight of the bird across the sky was a graceful sight.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or relating to waves.
meanings.sent1: Her undulatory hair flowed down her back in gentle waves.
meanings.sent2: The undulatory pattern on the fabric resembled ocean waves.
meanings.sent3: The undulatory music filled the room with a sense of fluidity and movement.
meanings.sent4: The undulatory landscape of the desert dunes was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The undulatory sound of the wind through the trees was soothing.

meanings.definition: Having a wavelike form or outline.
meanings.sent1: The undulatory shape of the seashell was intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The undulatory design on the vase gave it a unique and elegant look.
meanings.sent3: The undulatory path of the river carved through the valley with grace.
meanings.sent4: The undulatory clouds in the sky painted a serene picture at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The undulatory pattern of the sand dunes created a mesmerizing landscape.
